content.question: During a rainfall, the depth of water in a rain gauge increases at a rate modeled by <math><semantics><mrow><mi>R</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>80</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGsbGaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0JaaGimaiaac6cacaaI 1aGaey4kaSIaamiDaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4Camaabmaapaqaa8qada WcaaWdaeaapeGaeqiWdaNaamiDa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaa aaGcpaqaa8qacaaI4aGaaGimaaaaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@4855@</annotation></semantics></math> , where t is the time in hours since the start of the rainfall and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>R</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGsbGaaeiia8aacaGGOaWdbiaadshacaGGPaaaaa@3A01@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is measured in centimeters per hour. How much did the depth of water in the rain gauge increase from <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn><mtext> </mtext></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaaeiiaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIWaGaaeiiaaaa@3AB8@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>to <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>t</mi><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG0bGaaeiiaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIZaaaaa@3A18@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> hours?
